People you block can no longer invite you to events or parties, start a conversation with you, add you as a friend or see things you post on your timeline. If you\'re friends, blocking someone will also unfriend them.
Your party has Oculus Rift users. When you launch into the selected application, Oculus Rift users won\'t be able to launch with you
%1$s hasn\'t connected their account to Facebook so they can\'t access chats.

Removing a friend has no effect on your Facebook account. If you\'re friends on Facebook, you will remain friends.

Select an app to launch with your party.
You can travel to the party’s location while you wait for others to join.
Travel to the party’s location to meet up with other people in the party.
Couldn\'t send invite. Please try again.
You were previously removed from this party and cannot rejoin. Start a new party to continue.
Couldn\'t join party. Please try again.
Couldn\'t leave party. Please try again.

Couldn\'t start party. Please try again.

Couldn\'t prepare app launch. Please try again.
Enter your Facebook password to start using Messenger from VR.
Enter your Facebook password to connect with your Facebook friends using Messenger from VR.
An error has occurred. Please try again later.

You can now use Messenger to connect with your friends wherever they are. Once you sign in to Messenger using your Facebook password, invite people you know to explore VR and jump into games with you. You can switch between Messenger and Oculus Chats whenever you want.

If you share your headset with friends and family, you can keep other people from seeing your messages by signing out of Messenger from the Messenger settings. To sign back in, select your Messenger profile and re-enter your password.

The Facebook Terms of Service and Supplemental Oculus Terms of Service will apply to you.

You can now switch between Messenger and Oculus Chats to connect with your friends no matter where they are. Once you sign in to Messenger using your Facebook password, you can invite people you know to explore VR and jump into experiences and games together.

If you want to share your headset with friends and family, you can keep other people from seeing your messages by signing out of Messenger from the Messenger settings. To sign back in, select your Facebook profile and re-enter your password.

The Facebook Terms of Service and Supplemental Oculus Terms of Service will apply to you.

You can now switch between your Oculus and Messenger profiles and use Messenger to connect with your friends no matter where they are. Now that you’re signed in, you can chat with friends and easily jump into games and experiences together.

If you choose to share your headset with friends and family, you can keep other people from seeing your messages by signing out of Messenger from the Messenger settings. When you want to sign back in, select your Facebook profile and re-enter your password.
To chat with your Oculus friends, select your profile from the top left corner of this screen.

If you choose to share your headset with friends and family, you can keep other people from seeing your messages by signing out of Messenger from the Messenger settings. When you want to sign back in, select your Facebook profile and re-enter your password.
Your sign in failed too many times. Please try again later.
Couldn\'t unfriend user. Please try again.
Something went wrong. Please try again.
You blocked %3$d people in this party: %1$s, %2$s and %4$d others. You won\'t be able to hear each other.
You blocked one person in this party: %1$s. You won\'t be able to hear each other.
You blocked two people in this party: %1$s and %2$s. You won\'t be able to hear each other.
People in this party will be able to see your Oculus activity independent of your Activity Setting.
No one has joined this party yet

This party does not currently have a location.
This party can only be joined with an invite.
People in this party can invite their friends.
Anyone with the link can join this party and share this link with their friends through Messenger. The party leader can turn off link-sharing at any time.
Tap here to finish undocking your mobile device.
Press the to open your notifications
Open your notifications by using the Oculus button hand gesture.
Mute your mic at any time.
People in your party can now hear you
Your microphone is off. You can change this in your settings.
The app you\'re using doesn\'t work with party audio. Party audio will resume when you exit this app.
Hear and talk to the party again.

Switch to your Facebook profile to chat with your Facebook friends.

Choose an App for This Party
Choose a Location for This Party
Anyone with the link can join this party
People can share the link with their friends through Messenger. You can update link-sharing at any time from the party settings.

People you block can no longer invite you to events or parties, start a conversation with you, add you as a friend or see things you post on your timeline. If you\'re friends, blocking someone will also unfriend them.
If you leave this party, you can still rejoin later while the party is active.
Are you sure you want to leave?
There are currently no active friends to invite.
Removing %1$s from this party will disconnect their audio from the other party members. %1$s will not be able to see or rejoin this party.
Are you sure you want to leave your current party? You won\'t be able to join this party again unless you are re-invited.
Changing this party from invite-only to open to friends will make it visible to anyone who is a friend of someone in the current party.
Changing this party from open to friends to invite-only will make it accessible only to people currently in the party or people you send invites to.
Removing a friend has no effect on your Facebook account. If you\'re friends on Facebook, you will remain friends.

Your friends and contacts will see when you\'re active or recently active. You\'ll appear active or recently active unless you turn off the setting every place you\'re using Messenger or Facebook. You\'ll also see when your friends and contacts are active or recently active. Learn More.
You can sign out to hide Messenger chats and notifications if you share your headset with friends or family. To sign back in, select your Messenger profile and re-enter your password.
Once you sign out of Messenger, you won’t be able to chat with Facebook friends from VR until you sign back in. You will still be able to use Oculus Chats with your friends in VR.
Select your Messenger profile to sign in again.
Use Oculus System settings to define Messenger Preferences.
